extension.description: This script offers various possibilities to display online content inside skins as well as a complete MovieDB browser including info dialogs for various media types. Used services are themoviedb.org, theaudiodb.org, Trakt.TV, omdbapi.com and a lot more. Needs skin implementation for lot of functions. Uses [COLOR limegreen]M[/COLOR]etalli[COLOR limegreen]Q[/COLOR] 4[COLOR limegreen]Q[/COLOR]ed for playback and library functions.
